description: This is a React component file defining the App component for a front-end application. It manages theme toggling between light and dark modes, updates document attributes accordingly, and renders a user interface with a toggle button, logo, informational text, and a link.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Functional React component that manages theme state and renders UI.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle theme between 'light' and 'dark'.
